entries.meaning: (wrestling) A throw in which the wrestler lifts his opponent from the ground, swings him to one side, knocks up his nearer thigh from the back with the knee, and throws him on his back.

verbs.description: hipe (third-person singular simple present hipes, present participle hiping, simple past and past participle hiped)

entries.meaning: (wrestling, transitive, intransitive) To throw (an opponent) using this technique.
